name: Brave Soul Aliana
description:
Our Princess Aliana has been taken!

All signs point to the evil Graxur.

He has taken Aliana to his underground stronghold.

It is now up to you, brave soul!

Please rescue our Aliana!

How to play

Use your mouse to click on the Tile you wish to move to next.

Known issues

Not all item behavior is fully implemented.

Made for

#7DRL
